alert.note: Alert for Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tompkins County through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newfield, or near Ithaca, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Newfield, Cayuga Heights, Lansing, Freeville, South Hill, Allan H. Treman State Marine Park, Buttermilk Falls State Park, Myers and East Ithaca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
